mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_detail( mem_num, mem_passwd, mem_email, mem_phone) VALUES( #{mem_num}, #{mem_passwd}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_num, m.mem_id, m.mem_auth, d.au_id, d.mem_passwd, d.mem_email FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num = d.mem_num WHERE m.mem_id = #{mem_id}
